subject: Basketball (College)
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The presence of Auriemma may compensate for now, but eventually Connecticut’s lack of affiliation with a Power 5 football conference could spell an end to the Huskies’ dominance.
snippet: The presence of Auriemma may compensate for now, but eventually Connecticut’s lack of affiliation with a Power 5 football conference could spell an end to the Huskies’ dominance.
